flawed_nl_solution:
You first have to calculate the total mass of apples he had on the shelves, so you add the three kinds of apples: 23 kg + 37 kg + 14 kg = <<23+37+14=70>>70kg
Since he sold 36 kg of apples, he still has: 70 kg - 36 kg = <<70-36=34>>34kg
#### 34

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 74, not 70. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
